column4: this is the page that caused me too loose gdm http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=1191847&postcount=1
Does ubuntu have something like a repair. Don't want to re-install from scratch
following some instruction to fix sound I lost GDM
it's a little late now, but you might consider using something like PArtImage to clone your partitions, you can easily restore them later.
